summary: A young history researcher traces an old folk song dating from the time that the radio had not been introduced in rural Drenthe, telling about a series of gruesome murders.
cast: Vincent Croiset|Rosa Reuten|Susan Visser|Huib Broos|Rutger Remkes|Huug van Tienhoven|Ben Ramakers|Joop Keesmaat|Eric van der Donk|Nelly Frijda|Frank van den Bos|Nynke Laverman|Kim Goedegebure|Thijs Alberts|Mirjam Hegger|Danny ten Hag|De Kift|Abdel Achmed Salah
director: Directors: Adri Schrover, André van der Hout
title: Het zwijgen
